alert.note: Alert for Benton; Marshall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall, northwestern Benton, Fayette, west central Hardeman and east central Shelby Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Eads, or 13 miles northeast of Collierville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Lamar, Lakeland, Arlington, Whiteville, Somerville, Mt Pleasant, Lagrange, Eads, Michigan City, Slayden, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Piperton, Gallaway, Rossville, Moscow and Williston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
